name: Stephen Mallinder
description: '''Stephen William Mallinder''' (born 1 January 1955) is an English artist and musician who was a founding member of [[Cabaret Voltaire (band)|Cabaret Voltaire]], and went on to work as Sassi & Loco, the Ku-Ling Bros., [[Hey, Rube! (band)|Hey, Rube!]], Wrangler, and Creep Show.
